title: Computing in the Modern World
descrA: Website created in CSCE 190 - Computing in the Modern World
descrC: Goal of the website is to learn the basics of website development
descrD: Styled to get an understanding of CSS rather than look professional

title: Web Application
descrA: Website created in CSCE 242 - Web Application
descrC: Goal of the website is to use advanced techniques to create exercises and become proficient in website development
descrD: Styled to look clean and professional

title: Software Engineering
descrA: Project created in CSCE 247 - Software Engineering
descrC: Goal of the project is to create an application in Java while learning all the steps that go into software development
descrD: This application allows users to create task lists, thus increasing workplace efficiency
